name: Hentami: Vendetta
description:
Hentami: Vendetta Hentami: Vendetta is a Audio Visual Graphic Novella adventure.About This GameWARNING: MATURE CONTENT. This game contains violence, mature themes, and strong sexual content. Viewer discretion is advised.

Set in a future dystopian city, begin your journey with your beautiful soulmate Hentami. More then point and click choices to make, interactive fight scenes, kinetic love making, full audio visual ambient scene building — a new graphic novella experience.

Dive into the dark underbelly of sex and violence where you begin your story after you steal a large sum of money from one of the largest drug lords in the city. From there you discover a world of choices, violence and revenge. When you lose your most precious possession, all you have left is a Vendetta against those who took it.

"That which nourishes me, destroys me."Game Features
Custom GUI
CG Art Gallery
Original Soundtrack
Full English Voice Over
Monthly Chapter Updates
Several Potential Endings
Optional Implied Sex Scenes
